div.head: 筋脈沮絕
div.div: sinews and vessels are worn out and severed

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sinews and vessels are worn out and severed

sense.def: Illness Sign of a slackening and loss of strength with an inability to move following a destruction of sinews. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Wu wei yi ji 五味宜忌 quoting Su wen 素問 3: 筋脈沮馳 , “Sinews and vessels are worn out”, writes: 筋脈沮絕 , “ Sinews and vessels are worn out and severed ”.
